CustomField.formula: IF( License_to_Cover_Filing_Number__c = NULL, "No Link", HYPERLINK("https://enterpriseefiling.fcc.gov/dataentry/public/tv/publicFacilityTechDetails.html?facilityId="+ Name + "&applicationId=" + License_to_Cover_Filing_Number__c ,"Contour Link"))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used to show Broadcaster Countour from the LMS/FCC data. Click to show the map. Will show Contour map if there is a map, and be blank if no contour info in lms yet.
CustomField.label: Contour Map (Broadcaster)
